results.title: The comparative effectiveness of metformin and risperidone in a rat model of valproic acid-induced autism, Potential role for enhanced autophagy
results.text_hl: ...Is @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s ability to improve @<m>DISEASE_Autism_Spectrum_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067877 @@@ASD@@@ clinical phenotype driven by its autophagy-enhancing properties?

results.title: An Update on Psychopharmacological Treatment of Autism Spectrum Disorder
results.text_hl: Such polypharmacy will be more common as specific treatments for dysfunctional pathways are utilized which go hand in hand with other treatments for common comorbidities of @<m>DISEASE_Autism_Spectrum_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067877 @@@ASD@@@. An example is @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ which can downregulate the @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ pathway, and this treatment works well with @CHEMICAL_Amphetamines @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000662 @@@stimulants@@@ for @DISEASE_Attention_Deficit_Disorder_with_Hyperactivity @DISEASE_MESH:D001289 @@@ADHD@@@ and also Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors (SSRIs) for @DISEASE_Anxiety @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@.

citations.NLM: Aishworiya R, Valica T, Hagerman R, Restrepo B. An Update on Psychopharmacological Treatment of Autism Spectrum Disorder Neurotherapeutics. 2022 Jan;19(1):248-262. PMID: 35029811
citations.BibTeX: @article{35029811, title={An Update on Psychopharmacological Treatment of Autism Spectrum Disorder}, author={Aishworiya R and Valica T and Hagerman R and Restrepo B}, journal={Neurotherapeutics}, volume={19}, number={1}, pages={248-262}}

results.title: Metformin Alleviates Autistic-Like Behaviors Elicited by High-Fat Diet Consumption and Modulates the Crosstalk Between Serotonin and Gut Microbiota in Mice
results.text_hl: At present, no drugs are available to treat the core symptoms of @<m>DISEASE_Autism_Spectrum_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067877 @@@ASD@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@) is the most commonly used drug for treating @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, but it has been shown to have many additional physiological effects.

citations.NLM: Deng W, Ke H, Wang S, Li Z, Li S, Lv P, Li F, Chen Y. Metformin Alleviates Autistic-Like Behaviors Elicited by High-Fat Diet Consumption and Modulates the Crosstalk Between Serotonin and Gut Microbiota in Mice Behav Neurol. 2022;2022():6711160. PMID: 35222739

results.title: Influence of the Aryl Hydrocarbon Receptor Activating Environmental Pollutants on Autism Spectrum Disorder
results.text_hl: In addition, the review explores possible new @GENE_AHR @GENE_196 @@@AhR@@@-mediated mechanisms of several drugs used for treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Autism_Spectrum_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067877 @@@ASD@@@, such as @CHEMICAL_sulforaphane @CHEMICAL_MESH:C016766 @@@sulforaphane@@@, @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Haloperidol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006220 @@@haloperidol@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Novel role of peroxisome proliferator activated receptor-alpha in valproic acid rat model of autism: Mechanistic study of risperidone and metformin monotherapy versus combination.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ was able to alleviate the @CHEMICAL_Risperidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018967 @@@RIS@@@ induced @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ and improve cognitive functions highlighting its promising adjunctive role in alleviating @<m>DISEASE_Autism_Spectrum_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067877 @@@ASD@@@ pathophysiology.
